name: QRY_ADDL_RECIPIENTS
description: This table extracts the user IDs of additional recipients of the query.

columns.name: QUERY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the query record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ADDL_RECIPIENT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the other users who received the query.

columns.name: ADDL_RECIPIENT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: QUERY_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.
